text: Twitter is unbelievably silent today..Not silent but lesser tweets..Anyone awake from my timezone?

comments.text: @cheth Not your timezone, but still awake here. Guess loads of people still enjoy another chocolate easter egg ;).
@cheth #meAwake ;)
@cheth Yep, here I am bro :)
@arunbasillal hey! I've been keeping up w your blog. Fabulous job!
@manikarthik me too, Technically we are not in the same time zone, rt? Back in India?
@TheDailyBlonde Hey there! Thanks a lot :) How is Easter coming along? Happy Easter :)
@arunbasillal Well no am at the 4:30 GMT zone :)
@cheth It's 4:15AM in Jakarta, and I'm still awake.. :). What time is it there?
@cheth i agree. it is kinda quiet. :)
@cheth I am here dude :))
@cheth LoL, yes, me! me! I'm awake! ;) Everyone else is eating or praying, I'm doing both, just on a keyboard ;) e.

text: I spent half of yesterday trying to rock a rhyme, until my cousin pointed out that it's tricky to do that.

comments.text: @chrisbrogan did you just slip in a Run DMC reference? heh
@chrisbrogan LOL! Tricky. Now that will be in my head.
@JeanineByers - :)
@chrisbrogan Would that be cousin Run?
@iGoByDoc - oui.
@chrisbrogan Is that your easter ode to the brothas known as RUN DMC
@keyinfluencer - si.
@chrisbrogan: Rockin a rhyme w/ MC Brogan - Vid Op ;)
@chrisbrogan Especially one that's right on time.
@chrisbergman - that just won't happen. I tried, but they were bothering my poor father by that point.
@chrisbrogan tried to resist the temptation to say "how is it? " I was not able to resist.
@jminni - I'm a better man for knowing, though. :-)

text: went to the apple store to finally buy snow leopard. it was closed for Easter (both happy and sad about that). no ipad hacking today...

comments.text: @jazzychad ok, this following option on push.ly is pimp. Thanks!  Now I can selectively follow peeps i want :)
@jmartinez302 sweet! Make sure to tell your friends :)
@jazzychad lol I put it on my wife's phone without her permission. She needs it just doesn't know it ;)
@jazzychad i went to log into push.ly and it froze again. :(
@jmartinez302 what error are you seeing? email me, chad at notifo dot com
@jazzychad that's what's weird. No error just a blank page when I hit sign in with Twitter.
@jmartinez302 ok.. i see what happened. i put an error message in place to help out. not sure of root cause yet.
@jazzychad ok cool thanks.

text: You're not running your dream business because. ..

comments.text: @chrisbrogan My dream business has a mind of it's own and runs on cereal and lives in dressups. That's why.
@chrisbrogan because it's hard for me to find out what exactly IS my dream business. Suggestions 'how to'?
@chrisbrogan ... I'm still growing a set to make that leap of faith :) But it will happen
@chrisbrogan "because. .." it is running me :) I hope you have been well. You should come back to the MSP. Having an awesome early spring
@chrisbrogan I already am.
@chrisbrogan because I am working in it!  I will get to running it one of these days :)
@chrisbrogan ... I'm having more fun doing what I'm doing now.

@chrisbrogan ...we don't have the economic conditions to support it here and I can't/won't move to CA. 

So working on fixing the conditions
@chrisbrogan ... lack of time.. 24hrs just wont cut it
@chrisbrogan People normally await for the RIGHT moment! Failing to realise, there is no RIGHT moment!

text: Awesome! @repopular, code worth mentioning http://repopular.com/

related.text: RT @changelogshow: Awesome! @repopular, code worth mentioning http://repopular.com/
Congrats @chadfowler and @marchdoe! @repopular is a great way to find cool projects http://repopular.com/

comments.text: @pengwynn - Thanks Wynn, some fun stuff coming soon, trying to bubble up stats/info on the project pages. Follow @repopular for updates.
@pengwynn Seems like it could use some sorts and filters to be useful.  Currently lists the most recently mentioned by language.
@Marchdoe Would love to bounce some ideas/compare notes with you sometime. Maybe in #thechangelog on freenode?
@elight Yup, I'm sure there's more on tap. Great start though!
@pengwynn Thanks! Still working on making it more interesting/useful but I've already found a bunch of stuff I would have otherwise missed.
